story.text: __JSON Feed__ is a [[Web feed]] file format for [[Web syndication]] in [[JSON]] instead of [[XML]] as used by [[RSS]] and [[Atom (Web standard)]] - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JSON_Feed wikipedia]
A range of software libraries and web frameworks support content syndication via JSON Feed. Supporting clients include [[NetNewsWire]], [[NewsBlur]], and Reeder.
